flag_placeholders: 거 Flag 제출하기 딱 좋은 날씨네
낮말은 새가 듣고 Flag 는 솔로가 듣는다.
Flag 는 버려요. 깊은 데 빠뜨려서, 아무도 못 찾게 해요.
누가 내 머리 위에 Flag 놨어!?
가는 말이 고와야 Flag 가 온다.

actions.note: {{min}} 분이 지나기 전에 늘릴 수 있습니다.

wrong_flag_hints: Where there's a will, there's a flag.
To be, or not to be, that is not the flag.
Pride hurts, flag benefits.
Failure teaches flags.
No, no, it's not this flag.
Eyes wide open, but the flag is not here.
Don't be impetuous, think carefully.
Searching everywhere, this is not the answer.
Superficially looking, you haven't found the flag.
The answer should be right at your fingertips.
Careful planning and consideration, flag is not that simple.
The flag is really well hidden!
Is it loneliness that crushes you when your luck is bad?
Too excited! You still need to learn to think more calmly.
Hit a wall, could it be that you have reached the peak?
The years are peaceful, but the flag has gone far away.
The shallow water has dried up, the flag is still not found.
Where this flag can be found?
Beautiful thumbnails like smoke. Where did the flag go?
The quagmire is deep in depth, and the flag is still not found.
All is quiet, only the error prompt of the flag is here.
The correct flag is still not obtained.
The winds are bitter and cold, and the flag is still not on your hand.

accepted.ended: The game has ended, submissions will not be scored
accepted.message: The scoreboard will be updated later.
accepted.title: flag correct

unknown.message: Please contact the admin to confirm the submission: {{id}}
unknown.title: flag status unknown

created.message: Please note the instance expiration time
created.title: Instance created

note.message: Please extend lifetime or destroy instance in time
note.title: Instance is due

success.message: Please note the instance expiration time
success.title: Instance’s lifetime has been extended

dynamic_attachment.desrc: Distribute attachments by team, ensuring that the number of attachments is greater than the number of teams
dynamic_attachment.label: Dynamic Attachments

dynamic_container.desrc: Automatic flag generation, unique for each team
dynamic_container.label: Dynamic Container

static_attachment.desrc: Shared attachments, any flag can be submitted
static_attachment.label: Static Attachments

static_container.desrc: Shared containers, any flag can be submitted
static_container.label: Static Container
